tool_description: This endpoints gets the lowest price and the highest price of a particular item on Konga
name: Konga Price Range
title: Konga Price Range

api_list.name: Konga Price Range
api_list.description: This endpoints gets the lowest price and the highest price of a particular item on Konga
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://konga-price-range.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/price_range/konga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "konga-price-range.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://konga-price-range.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/price_range/konga"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
